channel.title: Bel-Air on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Bel-Air on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Bel-Air’ Sets Fourth and Final Season Release Date at Peacock
item.description: The final season of “Bel-Air” has set its premiere date at Peacock. The fourth season of the drama series will debut on Nov. 24. It was reported that the show would be ending with Season 4
